item.description:
度假燃料的需求并不旺盛。【原文：

Demand for vacation fuels has been unspectacular.

】

item.title: 萨哈林岛石油出口下滑，俄罗斯石油出口保持下滑趋势
item.description:
周出货量降至今年迄今为止的第三低水平

。【原文：

Weekly shipments fall to the third-lowest level for the year so far

】

item.title: 随着加密货币应用的激增，尼日利亚证券交易委员会将为加密货币交易所颁发许可证
item.description: 尼日利亚的最高金融监管机构计划向包括加密货币在内的虚拟资产提供商颁发许可证，以便在这个西非国家采用率激增时发掘商机并保护投资者。【原文：Nigeria’s top finance regulator plans to license providers of virtual assets including cryptocurrencies to tap opportunities and protect investors as adoption rates surge in the West African nation.】

item.title: 土耳其将利率维持在 50%，等待通胀进一步放缓
item.description: 土耳其中央银行将暂停加息的时间延长了第五个月，这表明该行仍致力于进一步降低世界上最高的通胀率之一，并实现其雄心勃勃的年底目标。【原文：Turkey’s central bank extended its interest-rate pause for a fifth month, signaling it remains focused on further lowering one of the world’s highest inflation rates and reaching its ambitious year-end target.】

item.title: 英国股票外流让经理们不知卖什么好
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）资产经理分析师大卫-麦肯（David McCann）表示，从英国股票基金撤出的资金太多，基金经理们更关注卖出什么股票，而不是买入什么股票。【原文：There’s so much money being pulled out of UK equity funds that fund managers are more focused on what stocks to sell than what to buy, according to David McCann, an asset manager analyst for Deutsche Bank AG.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油在埃及附近转道后长途跋涉前往亚洲
item.description: 俄罗斯正派遣一艘满载石油的超级油轮绕非洲一路驶向亚洲，这表明该国的舰队可能无法避免胡塞武装对红海商船的袭击。【原文：Russia is sending a supertanker filled with oil all the way around Africa to Asia, a sign the nation’s fleet may not be immune from Houthi attacks on merchant shipping in the Red Sea.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。股市大涨，黄金创纪录，拜登总统发表了激动人心的讲话。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. A winning run for stocks, gold at a record and an emotional speech from President Biden. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 南苏丹国接管被马来西亚国家石油公司放弃的油田
item.description: 南苏丹国营尼罗河石油公司接管了属于马来西亚石油公司子公司的油田和资产。【原文：South Sudan’s state-run Nile Petroleum Corp. took over oil fields and assets that belonged to a subsidiary of the Malaysian oil company Petroliam Nasional Berhad.】

item.title: 卡塔尔航空公司收购南非 Airlink 航空公司股份
item.description: 卡塔尔航空公司收购了南非 SA Airlink Pty Ltd. 公司 25% 的股份，这家总部位于多哈的航空公司希望扩大其在非洲大陆的业务。【原文：Qatar Airways bought a 25% stake in South Africa’s SA Airlink Pty Ltd. as the Doha-based airline looks to expand its presence on the continent.】

item.title: 印度煤炭资源丰富的邦将在法院裁决后通过采矿税
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度恰尔肯德邦通过了一项征收采矿税的法案，此举将抬高从煤炭到铝土矿等矿产品的价格。【原文：The Indian state of Jharkhand has passed a bill imposing mining taxes, according to people familiar with the matter, a move that’s set to inflate the prices of minerals from coal to bauxite.】

item.title: 石油期权显示市场对中东的担忧开始缓解
item.description: 随着以色列和哈马斯同意停火的希望越来越大，以及伊朗暂时搁置备受期待的报复性攻击，石油期权市场正在失去看涨的色彩。【原文：Oil options markets are losing their bullish hue as hopes grow that Israel and Hamas will agree to a cease-fire and as Iran holds back for now on a much-anticipated retaliatory attack.】

item.title: 随着中国电动汽车调查的推进，欧盟计划对特斯拉汽车征收 9% 的关税
item.description: 欧盟周二表示，计划对从中国进口的特斯拉汽车征收 9% 的关税，同时通知汽车制造商，欧盟决定对从中国进口的电动汽车征收明确的关税。【原文：The European Union said Tuesday that it plans to introduce a 9% tariff on Teslas imported from China, as it notified automakers of its draft decision to move forward with definitive tariffs on electric vehicles shipped from the country.】

item.title: 美联储面临多达一百万个美国就业岗位在修订中消失的问题
item.description: 美国截至 3 月份的全年就业增长可能远不如最初估计的那么强劲，这有可能加剧人们对美联储进一步落后于降息曲线的担忧。【原文：US job growth in the year through March was likely far less robust than initially estimated, which risks fueling concerns that the Federal Reserve is falling further behind the curve to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 德国工资增长强劲加剧欧洲央行的通胀压力
item.description: 德国联邦银行（Bundesbank）称，德国强劲的工资增长势头并未减弱，并可能使通胀率居高不下--这对欧洲中央银行来说是一个令人担忧的信号，因为它正努力使物价涨幅恢复到 2% 的目标。【原文：Robust German wage growth isn’t abating and will likely keep inflation high, according to the Bundesbank – a worrying signal for the European Central Bank as it battles to return price gains to its 2% target.】

item.title: 安哥拉考虑与大自然保护协会建立环境债券关系
item.description: 安哥拉正在考虑大自然保护协会（The Nature Conservancy）提出的一项环境债券项目建议，该项目将减轻安哥拉的债务负担。【原文：Angola is considering a proposal from The Nature Conservancy for an environmental bond project that would reduce its debt burden.】

item.title: 泰国国家能源集团 PTT 为石化和炼油装置寻找合作伙伴
item.description: 泰国国家控股能源集团 PTT Pcl 首席执行官 Kongkrapan Intarajang 表示，该公司正在寻求新的合作伙伴，为其部分石化和炼油装置提供专业技术和资金。【原文：PTT Pcl, Thailand’s state-controlled energy conglomerate, is seeking new partners to provide expertise and funding for some of its petrochemical and refinery units, according to Chief Executive Officer Kongkrapan Intarajang.】

item.title: 汇丰据称将探索出售南非业务以专注亚洲市场
item.description: 据知情人士透露，汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）正在考虑出售其南非业务，因为该贷款机构将重点放在亚洲市场。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is weighing a sale of its South African businesses as the lender focuses on Asian markets, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 中国监管机构要求银行调查人民币走强的影响
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着人民币兑美元汇率从八个月低点反弹，中国外汇监管机构正在评估人民币走强对出口商的影响。【原文：China’s foreign-exchange regulator is gauging the impact of a stronger yuan on exporters, according to people familiar with the matter, as the currency rebounds from an eight-month low against the dollar.】

item.title: 印度卢比在亚洲货币反弹中失利，受印度央行关注
item.description: 印度卢比与整个新兴亚洲货币反弹的趋势背道而驰，央行进入市场阻止了任何涨势。【原文：India’s rupee is bucking the trend of rallying currencies across emerging Asia, with central bank forays into the market seen preventing any gains.】

item.title: 中国考虑允许地方政府发行债券购买住房
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在一系列救市方案未能支撑起市场之后，中国正在考虑为地方政府购买未售出房屋提供新的融资方案。【原文：China is considering a new funding option for local governments to buy unsold homes after a series of rescue packages failed to prop up the market, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚洲顶级货币与美元争夺战中需要关注的关键价位
item.description: 本月亚洲货币的反弹让人们看到了一些关键水平，因为交易员们正在等待美联储本周在杰克逊霍尔举行的年度会议，以巩固对美国今年降息的预期。【原文：The rally in Asian currencies this month is bringing some key levels into view as traders wait for the Federal Reserve’s annual confab in Jackson Hole this week to cement expectations for rate cuts in the US this year.】

item.title: 受全面改革计划影响，新西兰碳价跃升至 5 个月新高
item.description: 在政府宣布全面改革国家交易系统的计划之后，新西兰的碳价格飙升。【原文：New Zealand carbon prices surged after the government announced plans to overhaul the national trading system, which has been in limbo due to persistent oversupply.】

item.title: 华尔街策略师押注欧洲股市创新高
item.description: 八月金融市场的动荡让策略师们对欧洲股市的前景并不担心，预计今年欧洲股市将再创新高。【原文：The August turmoil in financial markets has left strategists unfazed about the outlook for European stocks, which are expected to scale new peaks this year.】

item.title: 瑞士钟表出口增长，美国和日本抵消了中国的大幅下降
item.description: 7 月份，瑞士钟表出口略有增长，原因是对美国和日本的出货量强劲，抵消了中国和香港对高档和奢侈钟表需求的进一步下降。【原文：Swiss watch exports eked out a slight gain in July as strong shipments to the US and Japan outweighed further declines in demand for premium and luxury timepieces in China and Hong Kong.】

item.title: 调查期限临近，瑞典 Alecta 公司业绩喜人
item.description: 瑞典 Alecta AB 公司报告称，受其股票投资组合 "强劲发展 "的推动，其旗舰固定缴费养老基金今年前六个月的回报率达到 7.7%。【原文：Sweden’s Alecta AB reported returns of 7.7% in its flagship defined contribution pension fund for the first six months of the year, buoyed by what it called “strong developments” across its share portfolio.】

item.title: 有报道称新光将被收购，台湾新光股价大涨
item.description: 当地媒体报道称，拥有保险、经纪和承保业务的台湾企业集团新光金控接近被一家更大的金融公司收购后，该公司股价周二大涨 6.3%。【原文：Shin Kong Financial Holding Co.’s shares jumped 6.3% on Tuesday after local media reported that the Taiwanese conglomerate, which has insurance, brokerage and underwriting businesses, was close to being acquired by a larger financial firm.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑测试 1.30 美元，股市将下跌
item.description: 2024年1月3日，星期三，一名上班族走过位于英国伦敦金融城的伦敦证券交易所集团中庭。1984年1月3日推出的富时100指数是20世纪80年代改变伦敦金融城的众多创新之一。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：An office worker walks through the London Stock Exchange Group Plc's atrium in the City of London, UK, on Wednesday, Jan. 3, 2024. The FTSE 100, launched on Jan. 3, 1984, was one of many innovations that transformed the City of London in the 1980s. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 市场反弹就像来自...
item.description:
华尔街正在悄悄地从芝加哥的民主党人那里窃取一些声音，因为大跌带来的反转仍在继续。【原文：

Wall Street is quietly stealing some noise from the Democrats in Chicago as the reversal from the selloff keeps going.

】

item.title: 孟加拉国大亨汗表示必须重振投资者信心
item.description: 孟加拉国最富有的大亨之一说，这个世界第二大服装出口国必须做出更多努力，创造高质量的就业机会，安抚紧张的投资者。【原文：One of Bangladesh’s wealthiest tycoons said the world’s second-largest garments exporter must do more to create quality jobs and assuage nervous investors.】

item.title: 诺斯伏告诉 Cuberg 员工重新申请研发部门的职位
item.description: 电池生产商 Northvolt AB 决定将研发工作从加利福尼亚州转移到瑞典园区后，已通知旧金山子公司的在职员工重新申请集团内的工作。【原文：Battery maker Northvolt AB has told current employees at a subsidiary in San Francisco to reapply for jobs within the group after a decision to shift its R&D efforts to a Swedish campus from California.】
